source.09d8ccf3: Here the model mislabelled 3+3 = 6 records and we got less accuracy
source.13ffb83c: Here, the model mislabelled only 4 records and also we got good i.e., 87% precession and 84% accuracy.
source.f8161b9a: So, the data basically shows whether the kyphosis is present or absent after the operation. Age is the age in months. Number is #. of vertebrae involved in the operation. The start was the number of the first or top most vertebrae that was operated on.
